name: The Lost Frames
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 62: Colors.

The world used to be more fluid, but some great calamity has forced the world into two frames. It is your job to go to the three worlds and bring back the animation key frame gems, only then will fluid motion be brought back to the world. 

------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Space - Interact

Esc - quit

R - Reset room ( Only in Candyland)

[when unlocked]

J - Warp

K - ghost

M - Minimize

-------------------------------

Programming by:  Ben Drews, Diego Gonzalez [drgvdg.itch.io] , Diego Teran [clerium.itch.io]

Music and SFX by: Diego Gonzalez, Diego Teran

Art and Assets by: Natasha Kononenko
